["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Fedora Silverblue（原 Atomic Workstation）是 Fedora Workstation 的一个变体，使用只读根文件系统，通过 rpm-ostree 管理整个系统。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"使用方法","children":"使用方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/ostree/remotes.d/fedora.conf"}],"："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"[remote "fedora"]
url={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}
gpg-verify=true
gpgkeypath=/etc/pki/rpm-gpg/
# contenturl=mirrorlist=https://ostree.fedoraproject.org/mirrorlist","codeLanguage":"conf"}]]}]
